isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - SINGLE SPEED AXLE: SPICER - PINION POSITION

svcsubsecinfo.para:
Ring gears and pinions are supplied in matched sets only. Matching numbers on both the pinion and ring gear are etched for verification. If a new gear set is being used, verify the numbers of each pinion and ring gear before proceeding with assembly. (Refer to GEAR SET
for location of numbers.)

Pinion position is based on the nominal mounting distance measured from the centerline of the ring gear to the button end of the pinion ( Figure 57). This dimension is controlled by selectively shimming between the pinion cage assembly and the carrier housing.
The nominal dimension for the J Model carriers is 3.7695 inches (95.7453 mm). The nominal dimension for the W Model carriers is 4.2845 inches (108.826 mm).

caution.para: Be sure mounting surfaces are free of burrs and dirt prior to assembly as they will affect pinion position.
